title: U.S. And Cuba To Formally Re-Establish Diplomatic Ties
teaser: For the first time since Dwight Eisenhower was president, the U.S. will have an embassy in Cuba. The two countries are to announce on Wednesday that they'll open embassies in Havana and in Washington.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
